description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.en: Isekai Apocalypse MYNOGHRA ~The Conquest of the World Starts With the Civilization of Ruin~

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
I reincarnated as an evil god.  
  
Ira Takuto succumbed to illness at a young age and ended up reincarnating in a world that resembled the strategy simulation game "Eternal Nations," which he loved playing when alive. What appeared in front of him was Atou, a girl belonging to the evil civilization that he used to play as, "Mynoghra." The two of them decided to create a new country in this world once again.  


---
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

title.en: Tsumi To Batsu No Spica

altTitles.en: Spica of Sin and Punishment

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

description.en: At a regular high school, Hatori, a teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Sumika Tomugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tomugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tomugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student… two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

title.en: Gyeongseong Detective Agency

description.en: In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

title.en: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me

altTitles.zh: 穿越成倒霉NPC: 我有老婆罩着

description.en: He Qingyang traveled to the game "Sword Immortal Legend" he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

altTitles.en: Matchmaking of the Amagami Household

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

title.en: Don't Touch Me!

description.en:
A highly educated and wealthy elite who suffers from Haphephobia(fear of touching or of being touched) is forced by his grampa to work in the countryside for a few months if he wants to inherit the company. There he meets an ordinary, kind-hearted man.  
When the hot headed cat met the cheeky dog … what kind of sparks will it burst out?

title.en: County Princess Will Not Marry Four Times

altTitles.en: Jun Zhu Bu-Si Jia
Second-chance Life, Second-hand Love
郡主不四嫁

description.en:
Yuan Xiang Wei was the County Princess of Duan Ning in her past life, although she was forced to marry four times, but she still considers herself to be modest and upright.   
It just had to be that after her death, all four of her ex-husbands became influential figures. She considers it to be her running into bad luck.  
After rebirth she finally made up her mind, what is femininity or female virtues? She wants the center positition to abuse the scums, and to surpass everything below the heavens!  
But she didn't expect that all four of them were also reborn, and each of them all had one same wish ——in this life, she will only be mine!

title.en: Blade of Retribution

altTitles.en: The Cost of Violence
Price of Violence

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.fr: Le jour où Shiho, champion de kendo décide d’aider sa mère célibataire à tenir un restaurant de gukbap, il apprend que sa sœur, Shiyeon, s’est suicidée. Pendant les funérailles, Shiho se rend compte que quelque chose cloche. Ce n’était pas un suicide, elle a été assassinée. Pour découvrir la vérité et venger la mort de sa sœur, Shiho reprend son sabre et entame sa propre guerre.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

title.en: The Anti-Destiny Girl

description.en: Zhao Menglin was reborn as a wimpy daughter of an aristocratic family with inferior body constitution which can't cultivate immortal. She was framed by her stepmother, detested by her younger brother, and looked down upon by all the others! Through all the adversities, she met a mysterious celestial master who took her to the higher stage of cultivation and counterattacked all the humiliations. Eh? Why does the celestial master look her... in such a spoiled way?
description.fr:
Zhao Menglin renaît en tant que fille d'une famille aristocratique avec une constitution corporelle inférieure qui ne peut pas cultiver l'immortalité.   
Elle est piégée par sa belle-mère, détestée par son jeune frère, et méprisée par tous les autres !   
À travers toutes les adversités, elle va rencontrer un mystérieux maître céleste qui l'amèneau stade supérieur de la culture et a contre-attaque toutes les humiliations.   
Hein ? Pourquoi le maître céleste la regarde-t-il… d'une manière si perverse ?

title.en: Brother's Sick Love

altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

title.en: Rikai no Aru Karen-chan

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

altTitles.en: Thoughtful Karen-chan
Understanding Karen-chan

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

title.en: Happiness Meal

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

title.en: Senpai, Chotto ii Desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 先輩、ちょっといいですか?

altTitles.en: Senpai, Can I Have a Moment?

altTitles.vi: “Senpai, anh có thể cho em một chút thời gian được không?

description.en: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
description.vi: Cô gái giàu có và được nuông chiều 不知火零(Shiranui Rei) không biết nhiều điều về thế giới xung quanh! Cô thường hỏi những điều không hiểu cho đàn anh của cô ở câu lạc bộ thư viện. Nhưng những câu hỏi của cô đôi khi lại khó trả lời lắm…!?

title.en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!

altTitles.ja: キミの理想のメイドになる！

altTitles.en: To Become Your Ideal Maid!

description.en:
To return her master's kindness, her goal is to become the ideal maid.

A classic romantic comedy of love with perfect sugar content begins!

A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has no friends or girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses how Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class, was about to be kidnapped by mysterious men dressed in black, apparently Maya was sold by her parents to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he got through investments, but Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?
description.ja:
ご主人様への恩を返すため、理想のメイドを目指します♥
糖度満点王道メイドラブコメ！

高校生活が始まって数ヶ月、二条廉也は友人も彼女もおらず、
さらに一人暮らしという孤独な日々を送っていた。
だがある日、クラス一の美少女、神城真夜が謎の黒服の男たちに
連れ去られそうになっているところを目撃する。
真夜は借金の片に両親に売られそうになっていたのだ。
そんな彼女を廉也は投資などで築いた財力を元手に助けるのだが、
恩を返さずにはいられない真夜は廉也のメイドになることを宣言し……！？

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.ja-ro: Naze Boku no Sekai wo Daremo Oboeteinai no ka?

altTitles.vi: Phy Sew lu, ele tis Es feo r-delis ec I.

altTitles.en: Why Doesn't Anybody Remember My World?

altTitles.ja: なぜ僕の世界を誰も覚えていないのか？

altTitles.en: Why Does Nobody Remember Me in This World?

altTitles.zh-hk: 為何無人記得我的世界？

altTitles.zh: 为何无人记得我的世界？

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!
description.pt-br: "Por que ninguém se lembra do mundo verdadeiro...!" A época em que a grande corrida das cinco tribos competindo pela hegemonia no solo terminou com a vitória da humanidade liderada pelo herói Sid. No entanto, o mundo foi de repente "sobrescrito " na frente de um menino chamado Kai. No mundo reescrito, Kai viu a cena onde os seres humanos perderam para as cinco tribos por causa da ausência de herói Sid. Aqui dragões e demônios dominam o solo, e Kai é uma existência esquecida por todos os seres humanos. No entanto, depois de encontrar a misteriosa menina Rinne, Kai decide quebrar este destino reescrito. Em um mundo sem heróis, ele herda a espada do herói e a arte marcial e desafia as raças inimigas poderosas que reinam.

While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

altTitles.en: If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love
Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This

altTitles.es-la: Robé al primer amor de la heroína

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

description.en:
Unoki-kun, a boy who's been bullied since elementary school, ends up becoming the exclusive errand boy of the top delinquent of his school, Toramaru-san, who told him "Be mine" right after entering high school. But the truth is that Toramaru-san meant it as a confession of love!!

This is the beginning of a love misunderstanding between Toramaru-san, who thinks she's in a relationship, and Unoki-kun, who thinks he's being bullied.
description.ja: 昔からいじめられっ子体質の卯之木くんは、高校に入学しても早々、不良のトップ――寅丸番長に「私のモンになれ」と専属パシリにされてしまう。でもその実、寅丸さんは卯之木くんに告白したつもりだった!? 恋人関係だと思い込んでる寅丸さんとパシリにされたと思い込んでる卯之木くんの勘違恋(かんちごい)の始まり☆
description.ru: Уноки — парень, над которым издевались с начальной школы, в конечном итоге становится мальчиком на побегушках главной хулиганки школы, Торамару, которая сказала ему «будь моим» сразу после поступления в среднюю школу. Но правда в том, что Торамару таким образом призналась в любви!! Это начало любовного недопонимания между Торамару, которая думает, что она в отношениях, и Уноки, который думает, что над ним издеваются.
description.pt-br: Unoki-kun, um garoto sofreu bullying desde o primário acaba se tornando o garoto de recados da maior delinquente de sua escola, Toramaru-san, que falou para ele “Seja meu” logo depois de entrar no ensino médio, mas a verdade é que Totamaru-san estava confessando seu amor!! Esse é o começo de um amor mal-entendido entre Toramaru-san, que pensa que está namorando, e Unoki, que pensa que está sofrendo bullying dela.

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

description.en:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.
description.id: Duke Voreoti yang tampan adalah pria paling menakutkan di kekaisaran. Tapi suatu hari, dia ingin mengadopsi seorang anak?!
description.ko:
“아이를 입양한다”

어느 날 갑자기 떨어진 북부의 주인 보레오티의 폭탄 발언.
그리고 기적처럼 만난 “검은색”을 지닌 아이.

그런데…

“근☆육이 제일 좋아~ ☆불끈불끈☆ 모여라~ ٩(๑˃́ꇴ˂̀๑)۶”
“이두근 (ง˙∇˙)ว, 삼두근 (ง˙∇˙) ง”
“흉근 복근 짜릿해 ദ്ദി ˉ͈̀꒳ˉ͈́ )✧.”

“…주군, 저희 애들은 저 정도까지는 아니었습니다만.”

아니다. 우리 애가 얼마나 똑똑한데. 일곱 살인데 어려운 말도 많이 알고, 책도 빨리 읽고, 배짱도 있고… 너네 우리 딸이 구운 쿠키 먹어봤나? 아무튼 재능이 넘쳐난단 말이다. 우리 딸은 천재야. 얼굴도 날 닮아서 요즘 부쩍 미모가 꽃을 피우고 있지. 벌써부터 두려울 정도다. 이 내가 말이지.

……그래, 인정한다. 내 딸은 변태다.

多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...

description.en:
In order to eat me, my enigmatic stalker is protecting me from other strange women―  
  
A high school boy, Sakurai, has a secret he cannot tell anyone: he has been plagued by stalkers since he was a child.  
One day, his classmate, Ueda, suddenly transforms into a monster, revealed to be one of his stalkers.  
Miyako, who has always been closely following him, appears and saves him.  
She tells Sakurai that the monsters, commonly known as urban legends in Japan, are after him because they love him.  
What will be the fate of Sakurai who is loved by countless creatures disguised as beautiful girls?
description.id:
Seorang anak SMA cowok bernama Sakurai Aoi, mempunyai kutukan, yaitu selalu diikuti oleh monster-monster yang ingin mengambil nyawanya. Tapi, dia juga mempunyai pelindung posesif yang selalu haus akan cinta Aoi.   
  
Di satu sisi, dia tak ingin dekat-dekat dengan gadis posesif bernama Miyako ini. Di sisi lain, dia bisa dilindungi oleh Miyako. Dilema ini terus berlanjut di manapun dia berada.
description.pt:
Para me comer, meu stalker enigmático está me protegendo de uma outra mulher estranha―  
  
Um garoto do Ensino Médio, Sakurai, tem um segredo que ele não pode contar à ninguém: ele está sendo atormentado por stalkers desde que era criança.  
Um dia, seu colega de sala, Ueda, de repente se transforma em um monstro, revelando ser um dos stalkers.  
Miyako, que sempre esteve com ele, o seguindo, aparece e o salva.  
Ela diz à Sakurai que os monstros, comumente conhecidos como lendas urbanas no Japão, estão atrás dele por que o amam.  
Qual será o destino de Sakurai, que é amado por diversas criaturas disfarçadas de lindas garotas?  


---

description.en:
The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier.

Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life.

One day, when he's patroling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army


---

description.es:
El Dragón más antiguo y poderoso del mundo se cansó de su vida, así que elige morir cuando los héroes vengan por él. Pero sucede un giro inesperado después de su muerte, fue reencarnado como un humano. Él en su alivio, decide vivir una vida como un humano en todo su esplendor, y recupera su voluntad de vivir… pero debido a su gran cantidad de poder mágico, él resulta envuelto en muchos problemas, así que su misión es acabar con todo lo que moleste su tranquilidad, y así disfrutar de su nueva vida con los amigos que encuentra en el camino.  


---

description.en:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
description.es: Hay una maldición en esta escuela. La cual, le impide quitarse la ropa interior a toda persona que cometa "actos impuros" dentro de la escuela. Solamente la mano derecha de Kamite es capaz de romper la maldición y quitarles la ropa interior. Él les menciona a las chicas que han sido maldecidas y que es capaz de quitarles la ropa interior, pero… ¡Obviamente es casi inaceptable para ellas que un hombre cualquiera se las quite…! Así es como las chicas terminan pasando por momentos de confusión. Pero, si no les es quitada la ropa interior, puede que tengan algo que lamentar.
description.pt-br: Existe uma maldição nesta escola. Que impede que a pessoa que cometa “atos impuros” tire sua calcinha. Só a mão direita do protagonista consegue quebrar a maldição e tirar a calcinha, seu nome é Kamite. Kamite fala para as garotas que elas foram amaldiçoadas e que ele pode tirar sua calcinha, mas… obviamente é quase inaceitável para elas que um homem qualquer a tire…! É assim que as garotas acabam passando por vários perrengues. Mas se a calcinha não for retirada, elas podem ter mais problemas ainda.

title.en: Demon Lord Exchange!!

altTitles.ja: 魔王さまエクスチェンジ!!

description.en: Hero Filina’s party is on the brink of annihilation in the face of a powerful Demon Lord. The almighty demon proposes to spare their lives on one condition - that he may swap bodies with the hero for a year. Atty, a Priest and Filina’s childhood friend, naturally objects to the proposal, but Filina agrees to the terms to protect her companions. Thus begins a new journey for the Demon Lord, naive to the ways of the world, and the quirky group of adventurers, as they set out to vanquish the new Demon Lord once and for all...!!

title.en: Magical Girl Tsubame: I Will (Not) Save The World!

altTitles.ja: 対世界用魔法少女つばめ

description.en: The world is in danger! Who will rise to protect it? Introducing Tsubame, an ordinary high school student who dreams of becoming a magical girl. But if she has to choose between the world and her friends... A new adventure from Mapollo 3, the creator of PPPPPP! Buckle up for some passion, magical girls, and a dash of madness!

title.en: JJBA: Planck's Creek

description.en: This is a original story set in the world of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. In 1992, a small town in Canada called Planck's Creek is faced with the untimely death of a young woman, Patsy Paula. In this town that is a lot stranger than it seems, her childhood friends take on a bizarre adventure to unravel the mystery of her death.

title.en: Rent-A-Girlfriend

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.ja: かのかり
彼女、お借りします

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

altTitles.en: Rent-a-Girlfriend
Rent A Girlfriend
Rental Girlfriend

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

title.en: When a Villain Meets a Villainess

altTitles.en: When Villainess and Villain Meet
When a Villain meets a Villain

description.en: Atalanta, the head of an underground organization, is infamous for committing violent acts against nobles. One day, she receives a commission from the Emperor to assassinate the tyrant Grand Duke Lionel Bianca. Atalanta dreams of a future where her and the members of her organization can live a normal life, so she accepts the commission and infiltrates the Grand Duchy to assassinate him… But, why can’t he be killed? Will Atalanta be able to safely escape from the Grand Duke, who is suddenly whispering confessions of love?
description.ko:
귀족들을 상대로 악명을 떨치던 제국 뒷세계 조직의 보스, 아탈란테. 
어느 날 황제로부터 폭군 리오넬 비안크 대공을 암살해 달라는 의뢰를 받게 된다.
조직원들과 평범하게 살고 싶었던 아탈란테는 의뢰를 수락하고 
대공성에 잠입해 암살 시도하는데….
하지만 어째서인지 죽지 않아?
한순간에 사랑을 속삭이는 대공에게서 아탈란테는 무사히 탈출할 수 있을까?

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7 - Steel Ball Run

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part7『スティール・ボール・ラン』

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Steel Ball Run

altTitles.en: JoJo: SBR

altTitles.zh: JoJo的奇妙冒险 第七部 飙马野郎

altTitles.es: La Extraña Aventura de JoJo Parte 7 - Steel Ball Run
La extraña aventura de JoJo Parte 7: La carrera de las bolas de acero

altTitles.ru: Невероятное приключение ДжоДжо — Часть 7: Гонка «Стальной шар»

altTitles.ko: 조조의 기묘한 모험 7 부 : 스틸 볼 달리기

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 7: Cursa "Mingea de Oțel"

altTitles.kk: ДжоДжоның Шытырман Хикаясы: Болат Доп Бәйгесі

altTitles.pt-br: A Bizarra Aventura de JoJo, Parte 7: A Corrida da Esfera de Aço

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

title.en: THE IDOLM@STER MILLION LIVE! Blooming Clover

altTitles.en: アイドルマスター ミリオンライブ! Blooming Clover

title.en: Listening to the Stars

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love

altTitles.ja: 元ヤン娘、恋をする

description.en: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

title.en: VTuber Legend: How I Went Viral after Forgetting to Turn Off My Stream

altTitles.ja: VTuberなんだが配信切り忘れたら伝説になってた

altTitles.ja-ro: VTuber nanda ga Haishin Kiri Wasuretara Densetsu ni Natteta

description.en:
The shocking and controversial work has finally been adapted into a comic! The super popular VTuber comedy begins!

 LiveOn is a major management company that has many glamorous VTubers. The third generation "seiso" VTuber Kokone Awayuki accidentally forgets to turn off her live stream. 

Her completely drunk, natural appearance is broadcast to the world -- the gap is a hit and it goes viral! From that blunder one night, she becomes a super popular VTuber!! (TL from JP synopsis)
description.ja:
衝撃の問題作が遂にコミカライズ化! 大人気VTuberコメディ開幕!
数々の華やかなVTuberが所属する大手運営会社ライブオン。
その三期生で『清楚系』VTuberの心音淡雪は不注意から配信を切り忘れてしまう。
大泥酔の素の姿が世界に配信された結果――
ギャップがウケて大バズり！
一夜の失態から大人気VTuberへ駆け上がっていく!!
description.pt-br:
A LiveOn, uma grande empresa de gerenciamento com vários VTubers brilhantes, tem em seu elenco de terceira geração a VTuber "de imagem pura", Koino Fuyuki. Devido a uma distração, ela acaba esquecendo de encerrar a transmissão ao vivo.

Como resultado, sua aparência completamente bêbada foi transmitida para o mundo — e o contraste fez um sucesso estrondoso! A partir desse erro de uma noite, ela rapidamente se torna uma VTuber extremamente popular!

title.en: Subaru

altTitles.ja: 昴 スバル
昴

altTitles.en: Dance! Subaru
Dance Subaru

altTitles.th: ซูบารุ เต้นสุดใจ ไกลสุดฝัน

description.en: A small five-year-old girl named Subaru no longer has time for friends and play. Why is this? Her twin brother Kazuma is dying… and gradually forgetting everything. Even Subaru. And so the girl visits him every day, talking with him and dancing for him, trying to make him remember her. And he always does by the end of the day. Encouraged by a friend to join ballet classes, the girl does so and falls in love with the dance.
description.es: Mezcla entre shojo y manga para adultos, Subaru cuenta la historia de una niña cuyo hermanito agoniza en el hospital. Para intentar distraerle de su dolor, empieza a bailar en su habitación y así descubre su pasión por el baile y que tiene aptitudes para convertirse en una bailarina prodigiosa. ¡Un paso adelante pero en versión manga!

title.en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru (Pre-Serialization)

altTitles.ja: 鬼売れアイドルが今日も私を推してくる

altTitles.en: The Superstar Idol Crushes on Me Today Too

description.en:
Enatsu Sayuki. An unsuccessful idol with a one-sided rivalry with the ever so popular Sera. 
Touma Sera. A superstar idol, perfect in every way, who will take every chance to shower Sayuki with love. 

A fun girls-love comedy capturing the chaotic and heartwarming moments of their daily lives!

-----

Series of shorts posted on Ookami's twitter.
**Info about the serialization can be found [[here](https://x.com/thinking_man000/status/1804074781358125330)]**
